item.title: Update 2020
item.description: Update: Q1 2020 I wanted to drop a quick update because the last time I posted anything was in December. I said that I wanted to write at least once a month and I have not held up that end of the bargain. However, In the first 3 months of this year I have: Became ITILv4 certified Achieved the AWS Solutions Architect Associate Lost over 10 lbs Gained a little self control For ITIL, my current employer offered training for employees to attend a 3 day course concluding with the official exam.

item.title: But I Do the Very Thing I Hate
item.description: “For I do not understand my own actions. For I do not do what I want, but I do the very thing I hate. " Romans 7:15 (ESV) At the end of each year, like I'm sure most do, I reflect on the things that I have accomplished. It's great to remember all of the good things, but more often than not I find myself thinking about all of the things I didn't do.

item.title: Now What
item.description: I Just Bought A Domain: Now What A Cautionary Tale Writing a blog post is such a great way to solidify your thoughts. When you write, you really have to think about what you are saying. When you buy a domain name though, sometimes you are living in the moment and forget about being logical. Planning After I bought my domain name, I wanted to jump right in and start learning the ins and outs of creating a website.

item.title: First Post
item.description: WELCOME Hello and welcome! I’m glad you’re here and hope that you find value in what I write and post here. If you want more information about me, please check out my About page. I’m going to leave this short since I’m still developing all of this! Thanks for visiting!
